abstract: Super Bowl to be played on Feb 1 pairs Seattle Seahawks, first team trying to repeat as champions in a decade, against New England Patriots, last team to repeat in 2005; both teams will focus on game and ignore storm of news media coverage.
lead_paragraph: The Seahawks can become the first team in a decade to repeat as champions, but the Patriots, the last team to accomplish the feat in 2005, can derail the dream.
snippet: The Seahawks can become the first team in a decade to repeat as champions, but the Patriots, the last team to accomplish the feat in 2005, can derail the dream.

headline.main: This Super Bowl Comes With a Script Written in the Stars
headline.seo: Seahawks and Patriots Bring Compelling Story Lines
headline.print_headline: This Super Bowl Comes With a Script Written in the Stars
